name: DevBuddy
0:
”Alexa, ask Dev Buddy what is PHP?”
”What is Java?”
”What is Swift?”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: dev buddy
des:
Nowadays, developers are surrounded by numerous programming languages and sometimes you forget about them.

Dev Buddy is here to help you that.

Right now Dev Buddy explains to you the different programming languages out there like PHP, Java, Swift and others. We will be adding more languages frequently!

If you want to help expanding its knowledge (languages and syntax), just contact me! Any help is welcome.
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
